TopicTitle: [1.12.x] Kerbalized Flags, Agencies, and Decal Textures [03Aug21] - And Suits [v1.0 - 15Sep21 - More Slim Suits].

Articles.Content: I think this pack is very well done. It is more creative than rescaling flags from the internet in Photoshop (like what I did)! I love many of the flags like the Belgian Kraken!
Thanks. Despite appearances on some of the flags, I have tried to not simply whack a ksp rocket on them and be done. It's much more interesting doing the agency logos if I'm honest.
Added a bunch more flags. More agencies should follow before the end of the week.

> 
> I think this pack is very well done. It is more creative than rescaling flags from the internet in Photoshop (like what I did)! I love many of the flags like the Belgian Kraken!

I like it too as normally it would be a lion on some flags ,but the Kraken really fits the flag.

I just wanted to say thank you for nice comments. 

I am also now taking requests. See first post for more info on what can be requested and what will happen with your request.

What about Kerjin Kalactic?

All of these flags seem to be similar to their real counterparts with one or more rockets added in. I do not believe every nation on kerbin is as 'into' space as the one hosting the kerbal space program. Perhaps you should change the flags around a little without just adding rockets to all of them?

All the flags in this pack *are* the nation (as represented by the player's choice to use them) that hosts the Kerbal Space Program. Besides, on the Kerbin in the Kerbalverse where my flags are in use, the Rocket and the Kraken hold the same cultural significance as Stars, Lions and Eagles on Earth.

For specific requests within the scope and theme of this pack, I'm all ears and happy to see what I can do.

Otherwise:

For a pack with a different scope/theme, try this one: [UAL002's Lorefriendy Serious Parody Flags](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86957)

Or for real flags, try: [ESA Country Flags v1.2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96484)
Works with 1.0 in case no one knew!!!

Your flags are really good, but Kerbal Stuff is going to nail you on these. I had my ESA flags mod on Kerbal Stuff for a while and they took it down.

I had to upload mine to Dropbox. You should probably make a back-up link just in case.
I like that this is a more faithful parallel of the actual flags, and not a parody where you get the gist of the spoofed original. Well done.
**[MOD - Updated the thread prefix to** **[Flag / Texture]** **, as this is neither a Parts pack nor a Plugin]**

Wow, I really like this pack. Those flags look really well made and flag-ish. Could you include Switzerland, maybe a Kraken and a rocket crossed on a red background? Also, what paint program are you using?

Added a few new things. Kerbin Galactic, Kalifornia flag, and a couple of others.

> 
> Wow, I really like this pack. Those flags look really well made and flag-ish. Could you include Switzerland, maybe a Kraken and a rocket crossed on a red background? Also, what paint program are you using?

I'm currently, very slowly, working on doing all countries, some regions and more obscure space agencies. Oh, and I'm using Photoshop.

None of the flags or agencies are supposed to be real-world real. If that's what you're looking for, there are other add-ons. This one makes everything real with a Kerbal twist. You are free to not download this if it's not to your taste.
